page.title: 09High Tech Teaser At Heamoor
page.content: On Wednesday 11th July Desmond,Lucy and I entered a{problem solving {competition}at{Heamoor School.}Lots of other schools entered too.Once everybody was there a man said that we had to do two problems in one hour.The first problem was to support the plastic button as far off the ground as possible using only the materials provided.We were provided with 24 straws and 10 pipe cleaners.The second problem was to make a support from the card provided which will hold the plastic button{20cm above}the ground and{40cm horizontally}from the centre of the support.For that problem we were provided with card and scissors and sellotape.When the time was up the man judged them. Desmond,Lucy and I were amazed to find that we had won.We would go on to the{County Finals at {Camborne Technical College.
